amendment.description: To provide for Department of Defense support of certain Paralympic sporting events.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2490 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2490 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592) To provide for Department of Defense support of certain Paralympic sporting events.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2490 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2490 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Salazar.
